nodes.text: You exit Vault 111 to a nuclear sunrise. Diamond City radio crackles: 'Raiders at Concord! Gunners at Cambridge!' Your Pip-Boy marks a settlement to the north.
In Concord, Minutemen are pinned by raiders. A power armor frame sits nearby, but you hear a growl from a nearby deathclaw nest.

options.text: Grab the power armor (requires fusion core)

nodes.text: Cambridge Police Station: Paladin Danse fights ferals. He shouts: 'Grab that laser rifle and cover me!' A synth component glints on a corpse.

options.text: Take the synth component and run

nodes.text: Sanctuary Hills: Codsworth greets you. 'The Institute took Shaun!' A workbench contains a 10mm pistol and a Vault-Tec lunchbox.

options.text: Take supplies and search for clues

nodes.text: The power armor's HUD boots up just as the deathclaw emerges. You shred it with the minigun, saving the Minutemen. Preston swears allegiance.
You save the Minutemen but take heavy wounds. Preston gives you a laser musket and leads you to Sanctuary. 'Another settlement needs our help...'
After the battle, Danse recruits you into the Brotherhood. 'Ad Victoriam!' Your search for Shaun continues under their banner.
The Railroad intercepts you. 'That component proves the Institute's nearby!' They offer help finding Shaun... for a price.
The lunchbox contains a fusion core! Vault-Tec files hint at 'the Institute' beneath CIT ruins.

options.text: Head to CIT with your new gear

nodes.text: Codsworth's flamer makes short work of raiders. Together you uncover a pre-war holotape: Shaun was taken to a place called 'Kellogg's'.
As Minutemen General, you rebuild the Commonwealth. Years later, you storm the Institute with an army of settlers... and find an old man claiming to be Shaun.
At CIT, you use the power armor to break into the Institute. The scientists surrender immediately. 'Father' welcomes you home... as his replacement.
